value:
When it's time to go shopping, I
dance to earn money for ingredients...
What do you want for dinner?

Through dancing, I transmit energy to
the audience. Even though I'm in a
new world now, that hasn't changed.

You're always up so early.
Impressive! Hey, why don't I
accompany you on your rounds?

As a dancer, I spend a lot of time on
my appearance. Of course, it starts
with clothes, but it doesn't end there...$k$pSo... Wanna take me shopping?

Hey, $Nu...
Something wrong? What is it?
You keep looking my way...$k$pHa! I was just teasing. You can take it
easy.

Hi there. I'm Lene! I've come all the
way here just to say hello.$k$pHi, from $Nf!

Perfect! I'm moving wonderfully
today!

That was about usual. At least I'm
not getting worse...

That's no good at all! I guess I
was out too late last night.

My body feels so light... I have
some ideas for new footwork—
I'll show you later!

I'm Lene! You'll get to know me faster
if I dance instead of talk, so... Here
goes!

Hmm... What color should I wear
today? Just a touch of makeup, and...
Oh, $Nu!$k$pWhat's that? When you look at me,
you forget about the war? That's the
idea—I dance to raise people's spirits!$k$pAnd if I dance in rags, it will just
remind them of the war, not make
them forget about it.$k$pI am not a warrior... I am a dancer. I
want to bring a touch of color to
people's lives.$k$pIf I can make the sadness and the
terror of fighting disappear from their
minds, even for a moment, then...$k$pI've done my job.$k$pIf the war is getting you down, and
you're feeling exhausted... Just come
and see me. I'll dance just for you!
えいっ！
それっ！
きゃああっ！
No!
Have it your way!
So rude!
Do whatever you please!
You rat!
Sorry...
Hehe
I'll show you what I can do.
Cheer up, OK?
Aren't you used to seeing dancers around here?
Huh? You're getting in the way of my dancing!
I hate dancing for strange men. I have no problem dancing for you, though!
I really want to meet my mother someday. That's why I dance, even if I don't always like it.
I don't want to be alone. Please, don't leave.
Mm-hmm.
Watch me!
Look after me, OK?
